lead_paragraph: The Communist Party of India (Maoist) said they did not sabotage the track that led to a deadly commuter train crash last week and demanded a “neutral investigation team.”
snippet: The Communist Party of India (Maoist) said they did not sabotage the track that led to a deadly commuter train crash last week and demanded a “neutral investigation team.”

headline.main: Maoist Group Denies Involvement in India Train Crash
headline.print_headline: WORLD BRIEFING | ASIA; India: Maoists Deny Role in Train Crash
